WeaponTraitDef.label: 5.8x42mm DVP88-A
WeaponTraitDef.description: The heavy-pointed bullet is a type of ordinary bullet with a heavier bullet head compared to the light-pointed bullet. They usually have a more aerodynamic shape and are often used in machine guns to increase the range and reduce the drag speed of the bullet.

WeaponTraitDef.label: CS/BME5 60mm Satellite-Guided Mortar Shell
WeaponTraitDef.description: Satellite-guided mortar shells have effectively enhanced the range and shooting accuracy.

WeaponTraitDef.label: DBD-09 18.4mm tungsten alloy anti-personnel shotgun pellets
WeaponTraitDef.description: Using tungsten alloy projectiles has enhanced the armor-penetrating capability. As the number of projectiles loaded is greater than that of the usual 12-gauge shotgun, it can cause higher damage.

WeaponTraitDef.label: 5.8x42mm DBU141
WeaponTraitDef.description: The specially developed high-precision sniper bullet can effectively improve shooting accuracy.

WeaponTraitDef.label: 8.6x70mm DBU202
WeaponTraitDef.description: The high-precision sniper ammunition specially developed for the QBU202 sniper rifle features a copper-cased lead core hollow tip structure, which effectively enhances accuracy and lethality.

WeaponTraitDef.label: 12.7x108mm DBJ10
WeaponTraitDef.description: Armor-piercing explosive incendiary rounds are composed of an inert core, incendiary agent, base and nylon wind cap. The inert material is released by the pressure of the core, generating a fragmentation effect at the speed of an explosive blast. Combined with the splashing incendiary agent, it achieves an explosive incendiary effect, creating high-speed fragmentation to kill the enemy.

WeaponTraitDef.label: 12.7x108mm DBT10
WeaponTraitDef.description: The specially developed high-precision sniper bullet can effectively improve shooting accuracy.
